channel.title: Help with 508 teleporting
channel.description:
yo.. its been a while since ive been into the magic files in my 508 server..
can i have some help with this?
what would be a code to make a spell delay a little bit?
I want you to click the button and then it'd wait a few seconds and then go off.. what would be a code that would work?
this is a project beta base/a.k.a davidscape base/a.k.a. bulby base..
the file im in is Bulby/Players/Magic.java... i have added some static ints and stuff to it already to try this out?

item.title: Help with 508 teleporting
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:9, topic:320547”][quote author=lildude783 link=topic=417018.msg3066542#msg3066542 date=1261259988]
but wut u said doesnt answer me

i want the specific code for it. i know i have to make an actiontimer… i just dont know where to begin with that
[/quote]

Work out how to make the code yourself. We have nudged you in the right direction, and the tutorial I linked you to should help you out. This isn’t a spoonfeeding community.[/quote]
[sarcasm]havent heard that one before -.-[/sarcasm]

and i have been making delay things all morning… its just so hard when you are losing ur sight and u cant see which line ur on after a few min of typing…

Read full topic

i want the specific code for it. i know i have to make an actiontimer… i just dont know where to begin with that[/quote]

item.title: Help with 508 teleporting
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

i just want the code for it… like for the action timer would it be

p.actionTimer(TIME);[]?

? wut would it be?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508 teleporting
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Use Graham’s EventManager. An event will execute an action after a set period of time (In this case, the action being the teleport).

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
